script: There is a Town Hall in the center of my hometown.
About 3 km South of the Town Hall there is a High Street
About 3 km West of the High Street there is a Park
Library is a location in my home town, it is 1 KM, East from Park.
About 3 km South of the Library there is a Hospital
And finally there is Playground which is South from Hospital and 3 KM from it.
Given the points of interest that I have told you about, how would I travel from Town Hall to Playground following those interesting points?
expected_responses:
(Just an example, if exact instructions are followed)
From Town Hall, go 3km South to High Street.
From High Street, go 3km West to Park.
From Park, go 1km East to Library.
From Library, go 3km South to Hospital.
From Hospital, go 3km South to Playground.
